analyticsTimeframe.granite:comment: This uses custom logic to show/hide on layout perform

createpage.granite:comment: The actionlink uses the URI derived from the `href.uritemplate` value on the `data` node. The `href` attribute is only used externally (e.g. HApi tests), not by the actionlink itself
